title: Reinstalling new beta client
body:
Hey
A few weeks ago, i deleted the new beta client, i thought i could easily reinstal it after... Now that i want to download it, i cant find it anywhere? Is there a way to download the new beta client after you already downloaded it once but deleted it after???

replies.body:
Because of how the Beta Client assets are handled, you may have to [**complete a clean reinstallation of League**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) to get the Beta Client again, depending on how you uninstalled it in the first place. Do you not have a box to upgrade in your patcher anymore?

https://imgur.com/a/GbgFI
